backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with storage mixins, access control, and extensive types plus CRUD-like query and update functions for user profiles and vehicle-related data.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions matching the main actor and a migration run function that returns old state unchanged.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for several frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by checking Internet Identity, admin status, and redirects or blocks access accordingly.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, logout handling, and main content area.
Provides Internet Identity login UI and redirects authenticated admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Allows admins to view and update their profile using backend queries and mutations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Displays blog post count and placeholder UI for future CRUD management.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Displays dashboard stats by fetching counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, posts, contacts, and credit simulations.
Shows contacts and credit simulations in tabbed admin view with loading states.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Lists media asset count and provides an upload button placeholder.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Displays total promotions and includes a button to add new ones.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Shows testimonial count and provides a button for adding new entries.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Displays total vehicles and includes an add-vehicle action button.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Fetches and displays visitor statistics such as visitors, users, and page views.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with public and admin routes, layouts, and pages.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form for submitting contact messages with validation and API mutation.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with validation and API integration.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Global error boundary that catches UI errors and shows a refresh prompt.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with contact info, social links, branding, and visitor statistics.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public-facing layout with navbar, hero, footer, CTA sections, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom action bar providing call, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and menu access using sheets.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Bottom sheet menu listing navigation links and closing on selection.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Top navigation bar with responsive menu, route links, and WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Call-to-action section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Simple hero banner with dealership title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Vehicle display card showing image, details, features, and actions for consult and details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity auth, login, logout, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend API calls for vehicles, content, stats, and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using mutations and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single blog post with SEO updates and fallback UI for loading or missing data.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with images, excerpts, and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle with features, pricing, likes, and share actions.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Displays commercial vehicles grouped into light duty, medium duty, and tractor head categories.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form and static contact details including map and consultant bio.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with banners, featured vehicles, search, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Shows passenger vehicle details with variant selection, dynamic pricing, likes, and share options.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Fetches vehicles, filters passenger types, and displays them in a grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Loads promotions and renders each with image, details, and terms, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Fetches testimonials and displays customer info, star ratings, and reviews with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and session parameters, persist them, and manage hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project architecture, state, existing features, and known frontend routing/theme issues.
